```{r volcano cand1, fig.width = 5, fig.height = 5}
colnames(DEP_output)
#pdf('cand1_no_overlap.pdf')
ggplot(DEP_output, aes(x=cand1_vs_Ctrl_ratio, y=-log10(cand1_vs_Ctrl_p.val), label= name))+
  labs(x="Enrichment", y= "-log10 (p-value)")+
  theme_classic()+
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(color="black", size="14"),axis.title.y = element_text(color="black", size="14"), axis.text.x = element_text(color="black", size="14"),axis.text.y = element_text(color="black", size="14"))+
  rasterise(geom_point(color = "#cccccc", alpha = 0.8, size = 1), dpi = 300)+
  rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(cand1_vs_Ctrl_significant == TRUE & cand1_vs_Ctrl_ratio>1.499 & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "black", size = 1), dpi = 300)+
  rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name == "DS1"), color = "seagreen4", size = 3), dpi = 300)+
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% proteasome_complex & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "firebrick3", size = 2), dpi = 300)+
   rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% mito_transport & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "dodgerblue3", size = 2), dpi = 300)+
    rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% cellular_respiration & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "tan2", size = 2), dpi = 300)+
    coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-10,15 ), ylim = c(0, 40)) +
    labs(title = "cand1", subtitle = "red: Proteasome, blue: mito_transport, orange: cellular respiration ")+
 geom_label_repel(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% proteasome_complex & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "firebrick3",size=2,  min.segment.length=0, max.overlaps = 20)+
   geom_label_repel(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% mito_transport & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "dodgerblue3",size=2,  min.segment.length=0, max.overlaps = 20)+
   geom_label_repel(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% cellular_respiration & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "tan2",size=2,  min.segment.length=0)+
 geom_label_repel(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name == "DS1"),label= "Bait", color = "seagreen4", min.segment.length=0,size=3)
#dev.off()

pdf('cand1_no_overlap_bigger_text.pdf')
ggplot(DEP_output, aes(x=cand1_vs_Ctrl_ratio, y=-log10(cand1_vs_Ctrl_p.val), label= name))+
  labs(x="Enrichment", y= "-log10 (p-value)")+
  theme_classic()+
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(color="black", size="14"),axis.title.y = element_text(color="black", size="14"), axis.text.x = element_text(color="black", size="14"),axis.text.y = element_text(color="black", size="14"))+
  rasterise(geom_point(color = "#cccccc", alpha = 0.8, size = 1), dpi = 300)+
  rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(cand1_vs_Ctrl_significant == TRUE & cand1_vs_Ctrl_ratio>1.499 & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "black", size = 1), dpi = 300)+
  rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name == "DS1"), color = "seagreen4", size = 3), dpi = 300)+
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% proteasome_complex & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "firebrick3", size = 2), dpi = 300)+
   rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% mito_transport & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "dodgerblue3", size = 2), dpi = 300)+
    rasterise(geom_point(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% cellular_respiration & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "tan2", size = 2), dpi = 300)+
    coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-10,15 ), ylim = c(0, 40)) +
    labs(title = "cand1", subtitle = "red: Proteasome, blue: mito_transport, orange: cellular respiration ")+
 geom_label_repel(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% proteasome_complex & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "firebrick3",size=5,  min.segment.length=0, max.overlaps = 20)+
   geom_label_repel(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% mito_transport & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "dodgerblue3",size=5,  min.segment.length=0, max.overlaps = 20)+
   geom_label_repel(data = DEP_output %>% filter(name %in% cellular_respiration & cand1_without_overlap=="yes" ), color = "tan2",size=5,  min.segment.length=0)+
```
